title: 怎么右键收割神秘农业的作物
author: 金玉但画师
txt_content: 怎么右键收割神秘农业的作物，是需要安装什么模组还是要改配置文件

replies.author: lilinjie
replies.txt_content:
右键收获需要潘马斯https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/pams-harvestcraft
或者https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/simpleharvest
或者https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/reap-mod

replies.author: Army_Master
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: TVXQQQQQ
replies.txt_content: 右键快速收获一定要用 潘马斯农场！  https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/pams-harvestcraft 望采纳~
